select count(*) from ( select distinct SAMPLENO, PATIENT_ID, MPI mpi, EXAMINAIM, to_char(RESULT_DATE_TIME, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') RESULT_DATE_TIME from V_HEMS_JYJG
)

order by RESULT_DATE_TIME
